t: Brand Registry roles: Invite others and manage permissions - Sell on Amazon
s: April 23, 2025 - Note that to receive an invitation, the contact must first have a Brand Registry account. If they don’t have one, ask them to create one. If they have an Amazon selling account, they should create a Brand Registry account with the same credentials they use to log in to Seller Central.
